changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS document_versions ( id BIGSERIAL PRIMARY KEY, documents_id BIGINT REFERENCES documents ( id ), document_name VARCHAR ( 255 ) NOT NULL, created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW ( ) NOT NULL, updated_at TIMESTAMP, content_url TEXT ); CREATE SEQUENCE IF NOT EXISTS document_version_sequence START WITH 1 INCREMENT BY 1;
